name: Pixel Purgatory (dTMSr)
description:
A very short game for the GameDev.tv 2022 game jam with the subject "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!". My first game jam entry.

Unfortunately, I misread the 10 day period as being a start date of 10th May, which meant I only had a few days as I was leaving on holiday - so this was literally mostly written during breakfast time over 5 days. I knew I couldn't get close to a finished game in that time, which gave me the idea of writing a game including unfinished games :)

The game is a Windows executable written with Unity. I tried uploading a WebGL version, but there was no sound and the screen size was wrong.
